summary: High jinks and chills ensue when a group of people become stranded at an isolated station and a legendary phantom train approaches.
cast: Arthur Askey|Richard Murdoch|Kathleen Harrison|Peter Murray-Hill|Carole Lynne|Morland Graham|Betty Jardine|Stuart Latham|Herbert Lomas|Raymond Huntley|Linden Travers|D.J. Williams|Wallace Bosco|Wilfrid Lawson|George Merritt|Sidney Monckton
keywords: based on stage play|train station|fifth column|train|ghost
title: El tren fantasma
